duties.name: Improved a healthcare application performance by creating and implementing a SQL server ETL from a replica DB source resulting in application 90% faster
Collaborating on creating Python scripts for monitoring data synchronization eliminating the need of human intervention to ensure integrity for PHI and sensitive data
Architected a cloud solution in AWS to support ETL, application health and data integrity mainly using RDS, EC2, Lambda functions, Docker
Patched application by implementing TypeORM with Express Js with the best practices to fix a potential security breach through SQL injection and scripting
